verbose_text: Relative to Control B cells, MRP1 KO1 cells reconstituted with empty vector or MRP1 K322L had elevated levels of total (GSH + GSSG) intracellular glutathione, while total glutathione levels in MRP1 KO1 cells reconstituted with wild-type MRP1 were similar to those observed in Control B cells (XREF_FIG).
